definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances/abbr. for 巡迴演出|巡回演出[xun2 hui2 yan3 chu1]
to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: And then they ended up buying out their contract and touring themselves around.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们结束了合同，并自己去巡演。

sentences.english: I try to visit a mall at every city while on tour.
sentences.chinese: 我会去逛每一个巡演所到城市的购物中心。

sentences.english: While on tour the band also recorded its self-titled debut album.
sentences.chinese: 在巡演过程中，他们也在灌制首张同名专辑。

sentences.english: There isa reason every decent band tours.
sentences.chinese: 这就是每一个像样的乐队都巡演的原因。

sentences.english: But, one day I would like to take a trio or quartet on the road with me.
sentences.chinese: 但总有一天我要在巡演上来个三重奏，或四重奏。

sentences.english: And how do you think about the upcoming tour in China?
sentences.chinese: 对于即将到来的中国巡演有什么想法？

sentences.english: He'd played the euphonium during our last summer tour.
sentences.chinese: 他在我们巡演的最后一个夏季中演奏的小低音号。

sentences.english: Vox is a must-stop for every Chinese touring band.
sentences.chinese: Vox是每个中国乐队巡演的必经之地。

sentences.english: In2004 he performed with the basle philharmonic orchestra during a concert tour in china.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，他随巴塞尔交响乐团在中国进行巡演。

sentences.english: A group of traveling Chinese Opera singers came to town.
sentences.chinese: 一群巡演的京剧表演者到达小镇。

sentences.english: Matt: Out tour manager got robbed by three ladyboys in a lift there, too.
sentences.chinese: 我们的巡演经理也在那里被三个人妖在电梯里抢劫了。

sentences.english: SUGIZO: After the tour I have my own recording to do.
sentences.chinese: 巡演之后我有自己的录音工作。

sentences.english: ALEV:Yes. This is our first China tour.
sentences.chinese: 是的，是我们的第一次中国巡演。

sentences.english: Please check with the respective promoters of this tour for the details.
sentences.chinese: 请与各地承办方代表确认关于巡演的详情。

sentences.english: As part of the luxury Asia tour, Lee will be meeting fans in Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 奢华的亚洲巡演包括在北京站与上海站与歌迷们见面。
什么时候战车将再次巡演？

definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
to perform (e.g. on the stage)/to lecture
maiden stage role/first performance/first public showing
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
